settings.title: We Love To Hear From You!

settings.text:
You are our #1 priority. If you need to contact us with questions, feedback, testimonial or suggestions to improve or products or services feel free to contact us!  You can contact us via email at info@teangle.com, by phone at 800-316-6320 or you can message us on our website chat or Facebook Page.

All emails are typically responded to within 24 hours and we pride ourselves on providing you with the best service possible. Our customer service staff speaks both English and French. You can also find answers to frequently asked questions in the online FAQs section.

Address : 2022 rue lavoisier #208, Quebec, Quebec, G1N 4L5, Canada.
